TextView.android:text: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
Without music, life would be a mistake.

The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference.
Go to heaven for the climate and hell for the company.
A day without laughter is a day wasted.
Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.
You talk when you cease to be at peace with your thoughts.
May you live every day of your life.
We have to dare to be ourselves, however frightening or strange that self may prove to be.
Man is the only creature who refuses to be what he is.
If a cluttered desk is a sign of a cluttered mind, of what, then, is an empty desk a sign?
It is hard enough to remember my opinions, without also remembering my reasons for them!
There is nothing either good or bad, but thinking makes it so.”
Never let your sense of morals prevent you from doing what is right.
Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something.
Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
Think left and think right and think low and think high. Oh, the thinks you can think up if only you try!
You do not write your life with words...You write it with actions. What you think is not important. It is only important what you do.
Without deviation from the norm, progress is not possible.
A woman has to live her life, or live to repent not having lived it.
Do not fear to be eccentric in opinion, for every opinion now accepted was once eccentric.
The most beautiful experience we can have is the mysterious. It is the fundamental emotion that stands at the cradle of true art and true science.
We are all atheists about most of the gods that humanity has ever believed in. Some of us just go one god further.
You're not to be so blind with patriotism that you can't face reality. Wrong is wrong, no matter who does it or says it.
If you ever find yourself in the wrong story, leave.
Maybe everyone can live beyond what they're capable of.
I was within and without, simultaneously enchanted and repelled by the inexhaustible variety of life.
Time is an illusion. Lunchtime doubly so.
The past has no power over the present moment.
When we are tired, we are attacked by ideas we conquered long ago.
I cannot teach anybody anything. I can only make them think”
Those who know do not speak. Those who speak do not know.”
We are addicted to our thoughts. We cannot change anything if we cannot change our thinking.
A paranoid is someone who knows a little of what's going on. ”
The price good men pay for indifference to public affairs is to be ruled by evil men.
Music is ... A higher revelation than all Wisdom and Philosophy
The easy confidence with which I know another man's religion is folly teaches me to suspect that my own is also.
A concept is a brick. It can be used to build a courthouse of reason. Or it can be thrown through the window.
If you win, you need not have to explain...If you lose, you should not be there to explain!
Like all magnificent things, it's very simple.
Morality is simply the attitude we adopt towards people we personally dislike.
Science is not only compatible with spirituality; it is a profound source of spirituality.
It is not true that people stop pursuing dreams because they grow old, they grow old because they stop pursuing dreams.
Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
A serious and good philosophical work could be written consisting entirely of jokes.
Let children read whatever they want and then talk about it with them. If parents and kids can talk together, we won't have as much censorship because we won't have as much fear.
Grown-ups never understand anything by themselves, and it is tiresome for children to be always and forever explaining things to them

Do not train a child to learn by force or harshness; but direct them to it by what amuses their minds, so that you may be better able to discover with accuracy the peculiar bent of the genius of each.
The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
Well, I must endure the presence of a few caterpillars if I wish to become acquainted with the butterflies.
Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
I would believe only in a God that knows how to dance.
Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.
If you're going to kick authority in the teeth, you might as well use two feet.
The true man wants two things: danger and play. For that reason he wants woman, as the most dangerous plaything.
The day the power of love overrules the love of power, the world will know peace.
The first duty of a man is to think for himself
The smallest minority on earth is the individual. Those who deny individual rights cannot claim to be defenders of minorities.
It is an ironic habit of human beings to run faster when they have lost their way.
Expect everything, I always say, and the unexpected never happens.
I shall look at you out of the corner of my eye, and you will say nothing. Words are the source of misunderstandings.
Time is a game played beautifully by children.
I don’t know what’s worse: to not know what you are and be happy, or to become what you’ve always wanted to be, and feel alone.
I started my life with a single absolute: that the world was mine to shape in the image of my highest values and never to be given up to a lesser standard, no matter how long or hard the struggle.
Those who educate children well are more to be honored than they who produce them; for these only gave them life, those the art of living well.
Man suffers only because he takes seriously what the gods made for fun.
One is not born, but rather becomes, a woman.
The most important thing is to enjoy your life – to be happy – it’s all that matters.
Take risks: if you win, you will be happy; if you lose, you will be wise.
You live longer once you realize that any time spent being unhappy is wasted.
A happy person is not a person in a certain set of circumstances, but rather a person with a certain set of attitudes.
Trust yourself. Create the kind of self that you will be happy to live with all your life.
It’s never too late – never too late to start over, never too late to be happy.
Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be.
The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
Life laughs at you when you are unhappy. Life smiles at you when you are happy. But, life salutes you when you make others happy.
Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
I wear my heart on my sleeve.
The sun is new each day.
The greatest education in the world is watching the masters at work.
Make bold choices and make mistakes. It’s all those things that add up to the person you become.
The best preparation for good work tomorrow is to do good work today.
Faith is the bird that feels the light when the dawn is still dark.
We are all now connected by the Internet, like neurons in a giant brain.
Life is what happens while you are busy making other plans.
Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
Liberty cannot be preserved without general knowledge among the people.
I believe things cannot make themselves impossible.
A good conscience is a continual Christmas.
You just can’t beat the person who never gives up.
The beginning is the most important part of the work.
A lack of transparency results in distrust and a deep sense of insecurity.
All things are difficult before they are easy.
You can’t wait for philosophy. You have to go after it with a club.
A hug is like a boomerang – you get it back right away.
Every noble work is at first impossible.
Work isn’t to make money; you work to justify life.
When your work speaks for itself, don’t interrupt.
What would life be if we had no courage to attempt anything?
My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness.
The mind is everything. What you think you become.
A man who carries a cat by the tail learns something he can learn in no other way.
As a businessman, my dharma is to cater to every taste of my viewer.
The person who runs away exposes himself to that very danger more than a person who sits quietly.
The true secret of happiness lies in taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.
Whatever words we utter should be chosen with care for people will hear them and be influenced by them for good or ill.
The sky is the limit. You never have the same experience twice.
There are only two mistakes one can make along the road to the truth; not going all the way, and not starting.
Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
Since we cannot change reality, let us change the eyes which see reality.
Work out your own salvation. Do not depend on others.
I am not afraid of an army of lions led by a sheep; I am afraid of an army of sheep led by a lion.
Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee.
The mind is like an iceberg, it floats with one-seventh of its bulk above water.
The only courage that matters is the kind that gets you from one moment to the next.
We gain the strength of the temptation we resist.
It’s not that I’m so smart, it’s just that I stay with problems longer.
It isn’t the mountains ahead to climb that wear you out; it’s the pebble in your shoe.
Without a struggle, there can be no progress.
Mistakes are the portals of discovery.
A good decision is based on knowledge and not on numbers.
The opinion which other people have of you is their problem, not yours.
An essential aspect of creativity is not being afraid to fail.
The true sign of intelligence is not knowledge but imagination.
A genuine leader is not a searcher for consensus but a molder of consensus.
When the whole world is silent, even one voice becomes powerful.
Every saint has a past. Every sinner has a future.
You must learn to be still in the midst of activity and to be vibrantly alive in repose.
Practice isn’t the thing you do once you’re good. It’s the thing you do that makes you good.
Perform your obligatory duty, because action is indeed better than inaction.
A man is great by deed, not by birth.
Hard work never brings fatigue. It brings satisfaction
Nothing worthwhile comes easily. Work, continuous work, and hard work, is the only way to accomplish results that last.
Dreams are fuel of life, bigger the dreams, bigger is the life.
It is not joy that makes us grateful. It is gratitude that makes us joyful.
Health is the greatest gift, Contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
If your happiness depends on what somebody else does, I guess you do have a problem.
Failure comes only when we forget our ideals and objectives and principles.
Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths.
Winning doesn’t come cheaply, you have to pay a big prize.
Continuous effort — not strength or intelligence — is the key to unlocking our potential.
If you don’t build your dream, someone else will hire you to help them build theirs.
Never stand begging for that which you have the power to earn.
The dreams I chased took me on a journey, a journey more rewarding than the goals
We cannot become what we need to be by remaining what we are.
When you look at the stars and the galaxy, you feel that you are not just from any particular piece of land, but from the solar system.
What would life be if we had no courage to attempt anything?
The moment you recognize what is beautiful in this world, you stop being a slave.
Happiness is in the heart, not in the circumstances.
Ignorance is always afraid of change.
Be a good listener. Your ears will never get you in trouble.
In order to excel, you must be completely dedicated.
Have a vision. It is the ability to see the invisible. If you can see the invisible, you can achieve the impossible.
An ounce of practice is worth more than tons of preaching.
Most people never run far enough on their first wind to find out they’ve got a second.
Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
There is never a better measure of what a person is than what he does when he’s absolutely free to choose.
The person who talks most of his own virtue is often the least virtuous.
There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
One of the secrets of life is that all that is really worth the doing is what we do for others.
When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
If you’re not making mistakes, then you’re not doing anything.
It requires less character to discover the faults of others than to tolerate them.
Competitors take bad breaks and use them to drive themselves. Quitters take bad breaks and use them as reasons to give up.
Better three hours too soon than a minute too late.
Don’t count the days, make the days count.
You can never do a kindness too soon because you never know how soon it will be too late.
You cannot push anyone up the ladder unless he is willing to climb.
It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
